message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $16,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you place on it, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is significantly below my bottom line. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $14,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $13,000 for the product.
